title: Carnal
description: Cierra, a skilled assassin whose life has always been defined by her deadly assignments—until she meets Steven Watson. Torn between the passion ignited between them and the mission she’s been ordered to complete, Cierra faces an impossible love or duty. Meanwhile, Steven’s only priority is protecting his sister. Romance was never part of his plan—until Cierra walked into his life. But when he discovers who she truly is, everything he thought he knew comes crashing down.Will love be strong enough to overcome the dark forces pulling them apart? Or will betrayal and deadly secrets lead to heartbreak?
author: Sheri Krom
